messages.content: Steve Brine is standing with me to secure strong and stable leadership for our country, and the best Brexit deal possible for you and your constituency of Winchester & Chandler's Ford. Steve Brine will be a strong voice for your community in my Government, and together we will always stand up for you and your interests.

It's important to remember that a vote for anyone other than Steve Brine here risks Jeremy Corbyn becoming Prime Minister of a shambolic coalition government. So back me with a vote for Steve Brine here in Winchester & Chandler's Ford on 8th June, and together we can get on with the job of making life in Britain better for everyone. Theresa May, Prime Minister

The NHS will always be a priority for me. The challenges surrounding local services are extremely complex which is why I have spent years building up key relationships to genuinely understand the issues. This allows me to bring key players together as I did with my recent ASKHETHS meeting looking at the future of acute hospital services.

With small children of my own, I am passionate about local schools. We have protected the core schools budget but I know rising schools costs are extremely challenging right now. I want to see the fairer funding reforms introduced and will be using all my experience, working with parents, heads and governors to fight for one if I am re-elected.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritizing the NHS and understanding the challenges surrounding local services, focusing on building key relationships to address issues in acute hospital services.
Passionate about local schools, aiming to protect core school budgets, address rising costs, and introduce fairer funding reforms.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's important to remember that a vote for anyone other than Steve Brine here risks Jeremy Corbyn becoming Prime Minister of a shambolic coalition government.
